titleInfo.title: USA v. Herring
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER TO WITHDRAW EXHIBITS OR TO SHOW CAUSE WHY EXHIBITS SHOULD NOT BE DESTROYED - Pursuant to NECivR 79.1(f) or NECrimR 55.1(g), counsel for Defendant, shall either 1) withdraw the following sealed exhibits, previously submitted in this matter within 15 calendar days of the date of this order, or 2) show cause why the exhibits should not be destroyed as to defendant Randall D. Herring. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf.(CS, )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska

Herring. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf.(CS, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Herring
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER APPOINTING COUNSEL - Timothy L. Ashford appointed as counsel as to defendant Randall D. Herring as ordered by Magistrate Judge David L. Piester. (SED)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: ORDER APPOINTING COUNSEL - Timothy L. Ashford appointed as counsel as to defendant Randall D. Herring as ordered by Magistrate Judge David L. Piester. (SED)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Herring
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER as to Randall D. Herring.It is ordered that: (1)The defendant's motion to continue 62 is granted.(2)Defendant Herring's revocation hearing is rescheduled to Wednesday, October 21, 2009, at 1:00 p.m., before the undersigned United States district judge, in Courtroom No. 1, United States Courthouse and Federal Building, 100 Centennial Mall North, Lincoln, Nebraska. The defendant shall be present unless excused by the court.Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. ( KLL, )

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska

titleInfo.title: USA v. Herring
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER as to defendant Randall D. Herring. It is ordered that: (1)The government's unopposed motion to continue 64 is granted.(2)Defendant Herring's revocation hearing is rescheduled to Friday, December 11, 2009, from 11:00 a.m. to 12:00 noon, before the undersigned United States district judge, in Courtroom No. 1, United States Courthouse and Federal Building, 100 Centennial Mall North, Lincoln, Nebraska. The defendant shall be present unless excused by the court. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (KLL, )

titleInfo.title: USA v. Herring
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER as to defendant Randall D. Herring. At the request of the United States Marshal Service, and without objection by the parties, IT IS ORDERED that Defendant Herring's revocation hearing is rescheduled to Thursday, January 28, 2010, at 12:00 noon, before the undersigned United States district judge, in Courtroom No. 1, United States Courthouse and Federal Building, 100 Centennial Mall North, Lincoln, Nebraska. The defendant shall be present unless excused by the court. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (KLL, )

The defendant shall be present unless excused by the court. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (KLL, )
